projects.title: VHR
projects.description: A Business Management Solution tailor made for HR. Private Repo. Image used is from working internal alpha prototype granted by Variance Reduction International. Private demo with alpha build allowed on request.

projects.title: Posty
projects.description: A small sticky notes applications I built using React with a custom Ruby On Rails API on the backend. I used this project to both reacquaint myself with this tech stack and to teach others how build a full stack application using this stack. Features include Authentication and Authorization using Devise + DeviseTokenAuth with full CRUD functionality.

projects.title: GipheeBot
projects.description: A Discord Bot that utilizes the Giphy API to post GIFs in a chat channel.
